name: Defense of the Ass
description:
Welcome to your first defense against spanking. You have been kicked off the your bear's throne and you must find your main enemy, which will require you to pass many enemies and not let them destroy you. Don't think it's going to be that easy, because everyone around you is hunting you and wants you dead... But it's worth it, maybe you'll find out what happens next...
You will walk through a dungeon of enemies, all this way for one purpose only - to regain your okace under sun and protect yourself from your enemies...

You were kicked out, but you promised to return and shine over all those who betrayed you.


  • Arena elements
  • Colourfull characters
  • Funny enemies
  • Some memes

The defense begins...
